graph_title: Number of in-house trainings per year
indicator_name: Anzahl der angebotenen Schulungen des Bezirksamts zum gendersensiblen Sprachgebrauch
source_organisation_1: Bezirksamt Treptow-Köpenick - Serviceeinheit Personal und Finanzen
page_content: The indicator shows the number of in-house training sessions on gender-sensitive language use in the administration. Between the years 2012 and 2021, no trainings have taken place in this thematic field.
